**One of Nepal’s Oldest and Most Trusted Bookstore | Since 1961 A.D.**

At Educational Enterprise, we’ve been igniting minds and nurturing a love for learning since 1961. As a leading bookstore, distributor, and publisher, we offer more than just books — we provide a pathway to knowledge, growth, and inspiration. Whether you’re pursuing academic excellence, seeking personal development, or getting lost in a captivating story, our shelves are filled with books that cater to every interest and passion.

We believe that access to education is the gateway to unlocking potential, and we strive to offer resources that support the diverse aspirations of our customers. Age, gender, or past experiences don’t define you; it’s your ambition and your desire for wholeness that matter. We are here to guide you on that journey, today and beyond.

Our carefully curated collection of books, ranging from essential textbooks in medicine, engineering, and business to bestselling novels and timeless classics, reflects our commitment to both quality and authenticity. At Educational Enterprise, every book is a stepping stone toward broader horizons.

Come, visit us, and start your next learning adventure! Together, let’s discover new possibilities — one page at a time.
